item.description:
Announcing a new Meetup for Our Circle of Friends!

What: Eats, Drinks and Conversation

When: December 12, 2009 7:00 PM

Where:
Supino's Restaurant
Rte 1 South
Danvers, MA 01923
978 774 0707

Ever wonder what the opposite sex is thinking? Ever want to talk to others that are dealing with the same issues as you? Not comfortable asking the questions you want answered?

Well here is your chance to have that conversation and ask that question. We are using this meetup to pilot a monthly series of conversations. If this meetup is successful we will have monthly events in various locations to have a dinner and conversation.

This month we will go out to Supino's in Danvers for some Italian food, some drinks and a discussion on the trials and tribulations of dating. This is a time to ask that question, share a funny experience or just get out there and socializes with other singles.

We will be making this a fun event where all questions will be anonymous and there will be no pressure for any member to engage in a conversation they are not comfortable with.

So come on down to Supino's and enjoy great food, drink and a night out with some friends.

Hope to see you there.....
item.name: Eats, Drinks and Conversation
